Package server

Class Server.ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
server.Server.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
Enclosing class:
Server
public class Server.ClientHandler extends Object implements Runnable
The ClientHandler class handles interactions with a connected client.
